meaning_str.bing:
adj. 有名的；好极了；〈古〉极好的
网络. 著名的；出名的；着名的

有名的；好极了；〈古〉极好的

著名的；知名的；出名的；闻名遐迩的

sogou-kaoyan.adj: 著名的[出现5次)];极好的[出现0次)]

1.en: Instead, there are limited possibilities for a thief with a famous stolen painting on his hands.
1.cn: 而被盗名画留在盗贼手里的可能性也很小。

2.en: As the next day to get there a little early KUTA beach, here with a nice rejects the equatorial sunset famous hebron.
2.cn: 不如第二天早一点到KUTA海滩，这里以美妙绝仑的赤道落日闻名。

3.en: Back in the 1920s, you could have seen all this at New York City's famous Hippodrome Theater.
3.cn: 回到1920年代，你可以在纽约市最有名的竞技场剧院看到这些表演。

0.en: I am Detective Potato, the world famous detective.
0.cn: 我就是土豆侦探啦，世界上最著名的侦探。

1.en: I am Detective Potato, the world famous detective.
1.cn: 我就是土豆侦探啦，世界上最著名的侦探。

2.en: So this is it. Shanghai's famous Little Dublin district.
2.cn: 就是这儿，上海著名的都柏林区。

3.en: Just across the bridge at Luna Park, you'll find Sydney's most famous smile.
3.cn: 大桥的对面的是月神公园，在这里您会看到悉尼最著名的大笑脸。

4.en: Skipper, look. Above Private. Dave's next target, Shanghai's famous mermaid penguins.
4.cn: 老大，看，菜鸟上面，戴夫的下一个目标，上海著名的企鹅美人鱼。

5.en: Because if I don't, he won't give my paper to Stephen Hawking. He's a famous physicist.
5.cn: 因为要是我不洗的话，他就不把我的论文拿给斯蒂芬·霍金看，斯蒂芬·霍金是个著名的物理学家。

6.en: But it was all worth it because you're a famous fossil! Now, you better hold that pose!
6.cn: 当这一切都值得因为你成了著名的化石！现在，最好保持那个姿势！

7.en: I have to find this recipe before my dad gets here. Harold Waldorf's famous pumpkin pie.
7.cn: 我要在我爸到来之前找到菜谱。哈罗德·霍道夫著名的南瓜派。

8.en: There was once a merchant, in a famous market in Baghdad. I really have never liked this story.
8.cn: 从前，巴格达一个著名的集市有个商人。我真的一向不喜欢这个故事。

9.en: This is the start of the famous night parade which will be kicking off in just a couple of hours.
9.cn: 著名的夜间大游行即将在几个小时之后开始。

10.en: Maybe we'll become famous artists. We'll go to Paris, drink coffee in outdoor cafes. How do I look?
10.cn: 也许有一天我们会变成著名的艺术家，我们就去巴黎，在户外咖啡馆喝咖啡，我看起来如何？

11.en: Oh, blimey! One of England's most famous myths has become a reality. As a new king has been crowned.
11.cn: 哦，天哪！英国最著名的神话之一，如今成为了现实，这就是刚刚加冕的新国王。

12.en: It was quite easy for us. We're famous detectives. But that's only half the mystery. Where has Teddy gone?
12.cn: 这对我们来说太简单了，我们是世界著名的侦探。这只是神秘事件的一半。泰迪去哪了呢？

13.en: Buckingham Palace, perhaps the most famous palace in the world, is the official residence of Queen Elizabeth.
13.cn: 白金汉宫可能是全世界最著名的宫殿，它是伊利沙伯女皇的官方居所。

14.en: The River Seine runs right through the heart of Paris, creating a natural divide between her famous Left and Right Banks.
14.cn: 塞纳-马恩省河自巴黎的心脏地带流过，自然地将巴黎划分为著名的左岸和右岸。

15.en: It was quite easy for us. We're famous detectives. But that's only half the mystery. Where has Teddy gone? Oh, I don't know.
15.cn: 这对我们来说太简单了，我们是世界著名的侦探。这只是神秘事件的一半。你们需要找到泰迪。噢，我不知道 。

16.en: Set aside a day for nearby Captain Cook village. In 1779, the famous English explorer was killed right here in Kealakekua Bay.
16.cn: 预留一天到附近的库克船长村游览。1779 年，这位著名的英国探险家在基亚拉凯库亚湾被杀害。

17.en: Another famous seaside suburb not to be missed is Manly. The 30-minute ferry ride from Circular Quay to Manly Wharf is all part of the adventure.
17.cn: 另外，您亦可以不容错过另一个著名的海滨郊区—曼利。从环形码头出发，坐船约 30 分钟就可以到达曼利码头，在这个不可或缺的地方展开历险之旅。

18.en: Daddy, when I grow up, I want to be a famous detective. George wants to be a detective, too. If you're going to be detectives, you each need a hat.
18.cn: 爸爸，等我长大了我也要做最著名的侦探。乔治也想成为一个侦探。如果你想成为一个侦探的话，你们就需要一个侦探帽。

19.en: Daddy, when I grow up, I want to be a famous detective. George wants to be a detective, too. If you're going to be detectives, you each need a hat.
19.cn: 爸爸，等我长大了，我也要做最著名的侦探。乔治也想成为一个侦探。如果你想成为一个侦探的话，你们就需要一个侦探帽。
